exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params aersi : append_entries_reply_sublog_interface si : sorted_interface xs : list packet p : packet ys : list packet net : network st' : name -> data ps' : list packet d : raft_data m : msg t : nat cid : name lli, llt : nat H : handleRequestVote (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) H0 : pBody p = RequestVote t cid lli llt H1 : nextIndex_safety net H2 : raft_intermediate_reachable net H3 : nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys H4 : forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h H5 : forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (xs ++ ys) \\/ p' = {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := pSrc p; pBody := m |} Unable to unify "pBody p = RequestVote t cid lli llt" with "nextIndex_safety {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}".

original: intros. unfold raft_net_invariant_request_vote. intros. apply H0.
